item.title: What we know about the Hudson helicopter crash
item.description: Six people have been confirmed to have died following the crash near to the New Jersey side of the Hudson.

item.title: UK announces further Â£450m military support to Ukraine
item.description: The package includes funding for radar systems, anti-tank mines and hundreds of thousands of drones.

item.title: US fires Greenland military base chief for 'undermining' Vance
item.description: The US military said it had lost confidence in Colonel Susannah Meyers' ability to lead.

item.title: Euphoria star Eric Dane diagnosed with ALS
item.description: The US actor, who was also in Grey's Anatomy, has the most common form of motor neurone disease.

item.title: China braces for strong winds, with lighter people warned they may blow away
item.description: State media is warning that people weighing less than 50kg (110lbs) may be "easily blown away".
